subtitle: This hearty soup makes a satisfying main course when served with crusty bread.

method.text: Melt the butter in a pan. Saute the onion and leek for 2-3 min, until just soft. Add the potato. Cook for 2 min.
Pour in the chicken stock and cider. Bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 25-30 min.
Leave to stand for 2 min. Puree the mixture in a food processor. Return the soup to a clean pan.
Pour in the cream. Crumble in the Stilton. Stir well.
Reheat, but do not boil. Stir in the parsley before serving.

title: Creamy Stilton soup
